mapper.sql: id,name,status,sort,remark,enable,update_time as updateTime,update_id as updateId,create_time as createTime,create_id as createId
mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,t.status,t.sort,t.remark,t.enable,t.update_time as updateTime,t.update_id as updateId,t.create_time as createTime,t.create_id as createId ,uu.username as updateName,uc.username as createName from sys_role t left join sys_user uu on t.update_id = uu.id left join sys_user uc on t.create_id = uc.id ${ew.sqlSegment}
